Text.Page:
I swear half the soldiers here are looking to get rich on "found" pirate treasure, and the other half are plotting vengeance against the Red Lash pirates for some unspeakable cruelty to their family members or whatever.

But why pick just one reason, eh, ?

If you head to the Hold, just west of here, you'll find the most lucrative pieces.

Go to it, !

The nagas aren't like regular pirates. Regular pirates would know exactly how valuable all these antiquities are. But all this was right under the nagas' noses—er, snouts—the whole time, and they had no idea.

Their tragic loss is our lucrative gain, eh?
Don't feel like you have to clear the entire grotto in a single foray, <PCNAME>. Those pirates aren't going anywhere, you know.
